exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables L, n.

In environment H : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t L : Language f : Functions L t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) m1, m2 : nat -> fol.Term L Unable to unify "subAllTerms (arity L (inr f)) t (fun n : nat => subAllTerm (m1 n) m2)" with "subAllTerms (arity L (inr f)) (subAllTerms (arity L (inr f)) t m1) m2".

exceptions.tactic: intros n t IHt ts IHts.
intros n t' IHt ts IHts.

exceptions.exn: The reference IHt was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet ++: Current bullet ++ is not finished.
The reference IHts was not found in the current environment.

original: intros t m1 m2. induction t using Term_ind. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. f_equal. apply Terms_ind. -- simpl. reflexivity. -- intros n t IHt ts IHts. simpl. f_equal. ++ apply IHt. ++ apply IHts.
